137 void USER_writeByte(unsigned char data,unsigned int offset,unsigned char byte_num){
138  if (byte_num > 3)
139  byte_num =0;
140  unsigned int byte_offset = offset *4 + byte_num;
141  *(((unsigned int *) USER_SPACE_ADDR)+byte_offset) = data;
142 }
